question.title: addLocatorHandler: iFrame cannot be found
question.body:
I am currently trying to implement the addLocatorHandler from Playwright. However, with my current code, the iFrame is never found. Example code:

@BeforeClass
    public void locatorHandlerTest() {
        getPage().addLocatorHandler(getPage().frameLocator("//iframe[contains(@id, 'offer')]").owner(), overlay -> {
            overlay.locator("//span[contains(text(), 'Close')]").click();
            }, new Page.AddLocatorHandlerOptions().setTimes(3));
    }

The iFrame that I am looking for looks like this:

<iframe id="offer_ea2b1925a740598be667-0" name="offer_ea2b1925a740598be667-0" title="offer_ea2b1925a740598be667-0" scrolling="no" allowtransparency="true" allow="payment" allowfullscreen="true" src="https://buy-eu.piano.io/checkout/template/cacheableShow?aid=LbGa28Pope&templateId=OTS8XB3CJ94D&offerId=fakeOfferId&experienceId=EX2VALKHILLA&iframeId=offer_ea2b1925a740598be667-0&displayMode=modal&pianoIdUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fid-eu.piano.io%2Fid%2F&widget=template&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dewezet.de" frameborder="0" class="" style="overflow: hidden; background-color: transparent; border: 0px; width: 735px; height: 714px;"></iframe>

The aim is to close overlays that appear randomly. Thank you very much and I would appreciate any help.
